items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek little black dress
items.body: Very sleek style. Fits like a dream. Looks expensive but definitely a bang for your buck. Got it so many compliments. I’m 5 foot 1, 130 lbs and I got a small. Super comfortable. Not see through at all. Great quality, I want this in every color. Read more
items.author: Katie Boyd

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, Flattering, and Not See-Through—A Total Win
items.body: I wore this dress to a summer wedding and felt amazing in it. The spaghetti straps and V-neckline give it a sleek, feminine look, while the ruched bodycon fit and side slit add just the right amount of drama. It hugs curves beautifully without feeling tight or restrictive. One of my biggest concerns with white dresses is transparency—but this one is not see-through at all, even in bright daylight. The fabric is soft, slightly stretchy, and surprisingly substantial. I paired it with nude undergarments and had zero issues. It’s versatile enough for a wedding guest outfit, a date night, or even a club look with the right accessories. If you want a dress that’s sexy, classy, and worry-free, this one checks all the boxes. Read more
items.author: Daisy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Absolutely Love This Dress!
items.body: This dress is so cute and fits perfectly — true to size, with a forgiving cut that’s flattering for all shapes. The material feels high-quality and comfortable, and the construction is solid, so it holds up well after washing. I’m amazed at the price for such a great dress. Definitely a new favorite in my wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Absorbed color easy when washed
items.body: Loved this dress so much. I wore it for graduation. Very comfortable and flattering however I ended up spilling something in it and when I went to wash it the dress absorbed all the other colors from my other clothing. It’s true to size and not see through at all. Read more
items.author: Melissa Rosemann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Love this dress!! The fit is amazing, comfortable and sexy. The slit doesn't go too high but it does go to mid thigh. Not see through, full coverage. I'm in my 30s and it felt mature enough to wear to an engagement party, does ride up a bit when you move a lot but I didn't mine Read more
items.author: Kristen Mccloskey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful design and color, but Disappointing Material
items.body: This dress has a very flattering cut, and the royal blue color is gorgeous. It looks stunning on and fits well. However, the material feels a bit cheap, which was disappointing. I really wish the fabric was better quality, because I absolutely love the look and fit of the dress. Read more
items.author: Liat B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Wore this to a wedding, dress fit great, super cute and perfect for the occasion Read more
items.author: Abigail Groendal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little Black Dress Reviewed by Natalia Pose
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This a great little black dress. The material is stretchy and comfortable fit. The stitching is excellent, no flyaway strings or loose strands. Dress also has an underskirt, but just in the front of the dress. The cut of the dress is very flattering, for all body types. The high split gives the dress a more sophisticated look. The dress comes down to the top of your knee. I’m 5’9 and 149 pounds and I ordered a small. This dress is a good buy for the price. The perfect dress to keep in your closet for all special events. Read more
items.author: Natalia Pose

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Bodycon V Neck Sleeveless Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Bodycon V Neck Sleeveless Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sparkly Navy Blue, Sparkly Purple, Sparkly Black, Sparkly Royal Blue, Sparkly Wine Red, Grey Blue, Sparkly Peacock Blue, Hot Pink, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
